pkgmetadata.longdescription: flake8-linenumber=================Flake8 plugin to limit lines number in a moduleInstallation------------ $ pip install flake8-linenumberUsage-----Add path to file and it's limit to your flake8 config (`.flake8` file by default)```linenumber = ./events.py=500 ./handlers.py=1000```Codes-----* ``L001`` Reports that logical line count has exceeded limit
